title: Sisters
name: Junjeong & Nammo
summary: Two souls bound within one body, the Scholar and the Warrior constantly fight for control. The Scholar foten maintains control, but the Warrior fights for control and often takes over, primarily when there is blood to shed. Their shared past is marked by tragedy, rivalry, and a mysterious massacre.
history: Orphaned by a powerful warlord, the sisters were trained in tactics and combat. After a victory celebration, the two sisters set out to kill the other and a massacre occurred, leaving one sister dead. Both claim to be the survivor, with the other a parasitic spirit. They now seek the power at the Estate to rid themselves of the other.

status.description: In good health and high spirit

magic: Forbidden knowledge allowing manipulation of life essence
